extendedInfo.description: Discover how to turn the expensive, unhealthy foods at America's restaurants into fat blasting super foods that cost just pennies - and taste even better!Over 140 QUICK and HEALTHY meals that can save you 10, 20, 30 pounds - or more!From the informative minds that brought you Eat This, Not That! comes COOK THIS, NOT THAT!, the ultimate recipe app for people who can't cook, who don't want to cook, or who love the kitchen but just need a healthy dose of inspiration.FEATURESâ¢ RECIPES: Over 140 of your favorite restaurant meal re-imagined as quick and healthy dishesâ¢ BROWSE: Discover delicious new foods in the âCook Thisâ section, or scan theâNot That!â tab to find old favorites and their corresponding upgraded recipeâ¢ GROCERY LIST: Add and manage recipe ingredients for easy in-store shopping,or e-mail to a friend or family member for a quick pick-upâ¢ SEARCH: Find your favorite foods or ingredientsâ¢ KITCHEN VIEW: Turn your iPhone or iPod horizontally to access recipeinstructions in a simple step by step mode ideal for cookingAll your favorite COOK THIS, NOT THAT! recipes, including mouth-watering photography, step-by-step instructions, and shocking comparisons for each:Cook This!: Spicy Potato SkinsNot That!: T.G.I. Friday's Loaded Potato SkinsSave: 1,000 calories and $5.41!Cook This!: Grilled Steak with Red Wine ButterNot That!: Outback Steakhouse Roasted Filet Tenderloin with Port Wine SauceSave: 515 calories and $11.23!Cook This!: Banana Rum SplitsNot That!: Baskin-Robbins Classic Banana SplitSave: 660 calories and $5.20!... plus over 140 other easy and awesome meals from the experts at Men's Health and Women's Health magazines.*Certain activities on this app may be licensed under one or more claims of U.S. Patent No. 6,585,516.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore!
reviews.comment: Loved the recipes but now it opens an ad that doesn\'t work. Please fix or remove the ad! I paid for the app. Are ads really necessary?
reviews.author: Rob Gochenour

reviews.title: Wishlist
reviews.comment: I love the CTNT recipes. They are outstanding. However CTNT Gods can you please fix some of the bugs? When you click on some recipes, it force closes the program (Chicken Pot Pie, Ricotta Cheesecake, etc...). I would love to try these. I love pot pie. Also I wish the grocery list would consolidate like items for ease at the grocery store. Some of the recipes have very odd entries under the \"What you\'ll need\" tab. Look at the Pork Verde. It says the Pork should be cut into 1. ? Please fix bugs.
reviews.author: Deric Merrill

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: I was looking forward to using the app. It opens for a second then shuts completely off. Guess ill keep till is fixed.i paid for the thing
reviews.author: Eunice Greene

reviews.title: Does not work!
reviews.comment: Now it doesn\'t even open and there is no response from technical support. Takes you to an advertised web page and freezes. Ingredients don\'t match serving size.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poorly executed
reviews.comment: This app was slapped together and poorly maintained. Every time I open the app it launches my chrome browser and redirects to an unavailable website. I try to reopen the app and it continues to do this every time. On the lucky occasion I actually get to the app its poorly laid out and has a big white bar on the side that displays plain text version of the recipe tabs. It\'s like they modified this app from a skinnier phone. Worst of all when I tried to email them, their support email is invalid.
reviews.author: Joel Henderson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Even when this app did work there weren\'t enough recipes how do I get a refund? This is not good business practice at all.
reviews.author: Mary K Traylor

reviews.title: What the crap?
reviews.comment: This is horribly frustrating. Everytime I\'m in the root menu of this app, it opens my web browser to a page that doeant exist! Uninstalled and refunded. HTC EVO 3D, Ice cream sandwich stock.
reviews.author: Adam Wells

reviews.title: It seems like its possesed!
reviews.comment: the first time you open it an ad shows up. I tried to close it but it won\'t do it. It will go straight to its website the ads website. I would click go back and it will go back to the website again. I did 10 times and it was still go back to the stupid website. I tried uninstalling it and installing it again . This happened to me many times. Is it too late to get my money back?
reviews.author: April Pearson

reviews.title: Woukd not open 2 hours after installed
reviews.comment: sent email to site.  email did not go through.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: I love this app when it works. Otherwise it stinks. Will force close on galaxy s after five min
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: Opens to a webpage that doesn\'t exist
reviews.author: Sheena Opara

reviews.comment: This could be alot cooler for five bucks. There needs to be way more recipes and maybe a way I can type in a product at the store and see if it\'s okay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great! Easy to use. Creates a shopping list. Love!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: This app is $5. I would think there would be more recipes. I would not use this app.  Not worth the money at all. Developer: I would appreciate a refund. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing on my Nexus tablet and phone. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: I bought this and every time I would use it glitches and send me to an empty website. Complete waste of money. The developer needs to fix.
reviews.author: Chris Hart
